Coming up on 200hrs. Game is hard asf, but fun and addictive. In base game levels. Practice mode is worthless because you cant practice the whole chart (level). You can only practice up to the point you've learned. Level 1-12 have a great difficulty curve although I would go 1-6, 9, 8, 11, 12, and then skip 7 because its boring asf. The "thanks for playing my game" level is by far the worst level. Song is terrible, difficulty is artificial, not fun. (yes ive beat it multiple times) DLC is good, mechanics are cool especially in custom levels, but the base levels for DLC are mid and convoluted with a whole lotta yap you need to spam through. Custom levels are where its at.

Coming up on 200hrs. Game is hard asf, but fun and addictive. In base game levels. Practice mode is worthless because you cant practice the whole chart (level). You can only practice up to the point you've learned. Level 1-12 have a great difficulty curve although I would go 1-6, 9, 8, 11, 12, and then skip 7 because its boring asf. The "thanks for playing my game" level is by far the worst level. Song is terrible, difficulty is artificial, not fun. (yes ive beat it multiple times) DLC is good, mechanics are cool especially in custom levels, but the base levels for DLC are mid and convoluted with a whole lotta yap you need to spam through. Custom levels are where its at.
